description: Monitorización Integral da Calidade do Aire

options.content:
Monitorización Integral
Calidade do Aire

targets.query:
from(bucket: "meteoloradb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodo_feria")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "airq")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "meteoloradb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodo_feria")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "part1u")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "meteoloradb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodo_feria")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "part2u5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "meteoloradb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodo_feria")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "part10u")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.description: Dióxido de carbono: partículas por millón.

from(bucket: "meteoloradb")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "co2ppm")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
